TopicTitle: Communication Dish falling off inside fairing

Articles.Content:
Hi! I was wondering about the communication dishes falling off from inside the fairing. I'm currently running 1.1.3 with RSS/RO/Far and the Comms DTS-M5 that comes with Ven's Stock Parts revamp always falls off anything it's attached too whether it's through a node or mounted on a surface. The description says that it will 'break under high dynamic pressure' but everything is shielded with a fairing. Basically, does anyone know how to remove the trait of breaking under high dynamic pressure?

 

TL;DR: Comm dish falls off inside fairing. Need to know how to remove 'snaps under high dynamic pressure' trait.

10 hours ago, Anjomar said:

Need to know how to remove 'snaps under high dynamic pressure' trait.

I presume that you're using Remote Tech. 

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULEModuleRTAntenna]]:Final
{
@MODULE[ModuleRTAntenna]
{
-MaxQ = Del
}
}

This MM patch will remove "snaps under high dynamic pressure" from all antennas.
